name: 3D Semi Truck Ice Road Racing - eXtreme Nitro Boost Trucks Edition
name_original: 3D Semi Truck Ice Road Racing - eXtreme Nitro Boost Trucks Edition
description:
Get ready for an amazing, adrenaline packed truck racing game, where you get to get behind the wheel of a big semi truck! Zoom your way through the icy roads full of a variety of obstacles.

- 3D graphics!.
- Easy controls.
- Amazing sound track.
